The instructions have changed now so I don't know.

Ill be first to admit I'm not the best at this, but I followed the original instructions and these to the letter, I don't know what went wrong.
Tried replacing files with originals and still no luck.

you can copy the game data and after that you can reinstall and then put the data back

so first go to my documents and open the ''electronic arts'' map and then copy the sims folder! now paste it on your desktop of whatever and uninstall the sims now reinstall the sims and now copy the sims dir on your desktop and open my documents again and then go again to ''electronic arts'' and then delete the sims dir now paste and you can patch the sims and copy the crack again Iliadfang
i hope it was clear enough!!

cheers
Ill give that a shot, thank you so much jasper.

Jasper.. 

 I would appreciate your input.. I have downloaded both needed torrent followed direction to a T.. It still tells me the CD is invalid.. I also cannot update. Gives me an error. I am running Vista 64 bit.. Would that have anything to do with it?

i guess not......about that 64bit thing!
you need to make sure that your firewall is blocking the sims (ts3.exe and simslauncher.exe)
and that you have copied the crack!
to patch you need the original ts3.exe and simslauncher.exe if you already copied the crack you need to delete the crack files(ts3.exe and simslauncher.exe) and rename ts3old.exe to ts3.exe and simslauncherold.exe to simslauncher.exe! and also make sure that your GameVersion in skuversion.exe that can be founded in the sims dir is exactly the number from the version that your sims is so if you never patched the sims it must be 1.0.631.00002
if it isn't change it and save! now run the patch again and look if it helped!
if your sims is patched to 1.3 it must be 1.3.24.00002 and if it is patched to 1.27 it must be 1.2.7.00002

give it a try

Now it wont let me uninstall, when I try it says 

An error [-5005: -0x8000ffff] has occurred while running the setup.

Please make sure you have finished any previous setup and closed other applications. If the error still occurs please contact your vendor: EA- etc.. blah blah

Obviously I didn't have other apps or setups running, tried restarting, never works, can't uninstall.

Ok I did everything got the crack and the patch to work- but now I CAN NOT play the game. Every time I try I get this message: We are unable to verify that your disc is a valid copy of The Sims 3.
Please contact customer services. I am not connected to the internet when I get this message. I do not have a mac, the game seemed to work fine before I put the patch in. PLEASE some one tell me how to fix this. I am not a nobie so there is on need for condescending comments. I've been simming for a very long time and this is the first time I've had this problem. Any input you could give me would be greatly greatly appreciated PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP!!!!!
Oh just two more things I am using DAEMON tools and I have Bitdefender virus protection.

did you patched to 1.4? and don't answer directly yes! look if you don't patched to 1.3 or 1.2.7


EA i support you but not in your fight against US.

When you uninstall the game it gives an option of "Would you like to keep the sims save files and addons?"

So don't worry about fucking up

@hannahxxx 
you can try to Go to your Game>Bin folder
Locate the file "skuversion.txt"
Open the file(with notepath)
Change the number in the line GameVersion to
"GameVersion = 1.0.631.00002" so make sure that this number  ^^^^^^^^^ is there not any other number if it isn't this number then change it to this now try it again!

First of all thanks for your great effort mate.Now i want to ask you is there a way to install the patch and your crack on 1.3.4 cracked version??I have already installed 1.3.4 and applied the crack so what do i need to do to install this new one?

@RhymesMatter maybe it is possible first try to install patch: Sims3_1.4.6.00002_from_1.3.24.00002.exe
if it does work: then copy the crack and past in it the sims/bin folder and replace and finished!
if the patch doesn't want to apple then you need to getter the original files FOR 1.3.2 (ts3.exe and simslauncher.exe so the UN-cracked files) and replace them with the cracked! and also make sure your GameVersion in skuversion.txt that can be founded in the sims dir is exactly the same number as the version that your sims is so in your case: 1.3.24.00002.

btw check your gameversion anyway!

i feel so dumb:(
ok so i downloaded the sims 3, the keygen, and after i put the code in it asks "please insert disc 1 that contains file layout.bin." So i looked through the comments on your original torrent  for the game and saw that you needed a crack and patches, so i downloaded this and i know that your steps are really easy to follow which is why i feel so dumb but i dont understand how to go about "apply" the patches. Also, I tried to rename the TS3.exe and the TSLHost.dll which is in sims>game>bin, correct? but it wont let me rename them, i also tried to copy and paste the crack into the bin but it says that there is not enough space :( I tried as much as i could to find the answers on my own but i just dont know what to do. Please help me
